Package org.elasticsearch.xpack.ql.expression.function.aggregate

package org.elasticsearch.xpack.ql.expression.function.aggregate
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    CompoundAggregate
    Marker type for compound aggregates, that is an aggregate that provides multiple values (like Stats or Matrix)
    EnclosedAgg
     
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AggregateFunction
    A type of Function that takes multiple values and extracts a single value out of them.
    Count
    Count the number of documents matched (COUNT) OR count the number of distinct values for a field that matched (COUNT(DISTINCT.
